kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

test.name: As a user, I want to login success with valid credentials

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.arg: ปุ่มเมนูมองเห็นแล้ว
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Wait until element is ready then click element
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath=//button[contains(@class, "w-fit") and contains(text(), "เข้าสู่ระบบ")]'.
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg: xpath=//button[contains(@class, "w-fit") and contains(text(), "เข้าสู่ระบบ")]

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains

kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns the text value of the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
